name: Sarah Johnson
problem_text: Manual customer onboarding is taking 40-90 hours per week as we scale. Each new customer requires 2-3 hours of manual work including account setup, email sequences, CRM updates, and documentation.
goal: Automate 90% of customer onboarding process to free up team for strategic work and handle 3x growth without hiring
conversation_summary: Sarah from TechStart Solutions is experiencing significant growth pain with manual customer onboarding. Currently processing 20-30 new customers per week with 2-3 hours per customer. They have a custom Node.js auth system with API, use HubSpot for CRM, Mailchimp for emails. Team is technical. Looking for immediate solution (within 1 month) to automate account provisioning, email sequences, CRM sync, and documentation. Budget confirmed at $5,500-7,000. High intent, ready to move forward.
next_steps: Follow up in 3 days if no response
Schedule kickoff call once quote accepted
